name: Billy Bouncer Remix HD
description:
Billy Bouncer  has returned after 18 years. You guide his actions now.

Made for the Billy Bouncer Jam for the purpose of keeping Billy prevalent in the minds of those who live today.

I joined the jam to late, so I'm forced to submit an unfinished product. But, I'll do right by Billy. I'll continue working as soon as I recuperate. I have given up bouncing forever, goodbye Billy I'm so sorry.

*Mild Cuss Warning*

WASD for movement

E for interact

Escape for quitting

You'll find the rest in there
